name: Hidden Springs: Escaping the hustle and bustle of the metro
description:
Hidden Valley Springs is a secluded and private resort, and naturally landscaped. It has irresistible natural thermal pools with tropical plants, giant ferns and century old trees as backdrop. The towering Amlang trees are known to be more than 300 years old, making Hidden Valley Laguna indeed a tropical rainforest paradise.

Hidden Valley is between Mount Makiling and Mount Banahaw, known as the origin of these natural springs with varying temperatures and waterfalls. Composing of pure mineral waters, that are said to be medicinal and rejuvenating.

There are six natural pools that can be enjoyed, including two shallow kiddie pools and one natural jacuzzi. The lovers' pool it is located in a secluded area, offering privacy. The Soda Pool is the massage springs. It has a forceful flow like a jacuzzi, and lying underneath the waters lets you experience water massage similar to European spas. Cool and warm water pools are also available. Take your pick or try them all.
 
Aside from swimming, other activities can be hiking and strolling in the surrounding rainforest, and follow the path to the "hidden waterfall" through wooden bridgeways and stoned pathways.

Lunch and afternoon snacks are served to the guest's delight. A perfect way to unwind and enjoy the blessings and beauty of nature while still close to the city.
